sentry.description: Sentry MCP server — exposes Sentry issues, events, releases, and performance data to AI agents.

tools.name: list_issues
tools.description: List recent unresolved issues for the project, with optional query filters.

tools.name: get_issue
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Sentry issue, including events, tags, and assignee.

tools.name: get_event
tools.description: Retrieve a specific error event with full stack trace, breadcrumbs, and context.

tools.name: list_releases
tools.description: List releases for the project with deploy and commit information.

tools.name: search_events
tools.description: Search for events matching a Sentry query string.

tools.name: resolve_issue
tools.description: Resolve or unresolve a Sentry issue.

tools.name: assign_issue
tools.description: Assign a Sentry issue to a user or team.

tools.name: get_performance_summary
tools.description: Get performance summary for transactions — p50, p95, throughput, failure rate.
